title: Bezhta - Luke (Book)
description: Bezhta translation of the Gospel of Luke. The Bezhta language, also known as Kapucha, belongs to the Tsezic group of the North Caucasian language family. It is spoken by about 6,200 people in Russia.

language.name: Bezhta
language.area: Southwest Dagestan; Tsuntin District; Bezhta, Tlyadal, Khasharkhota villages.
